column4: any time I try to run apt-get upgrade... 99% of the updates available fail with errors like "md5sum mismatch, Error reading from server, Bad header line, etc"   does anyone know what i could do to fix this?
this is on a BRAND NEW install of 5.10
make sure your sources are uptodate and correct
I can manually download the packages I need from all of my source repositories.  apt-get however returns all these errors
